description: A vertical timeline-style UI design system for presenting a roadmap. The design is futuristic and tech-oriented, using a dark theme with vibrant, glowing neon accents and custom angular shapes to guide the user through different phases.

primary.name: primary-background
primary.description: Deep navy/purple used as the main background.

accent-glow-primary.name: vibrant-purple-glow
accent-glow-primary.description: A bright, glowing purple/magenta for primary borders, headers, and highlights.

accent-glow-secondary.name: bright-cyan-glow
accent-glow-secondary.description: A vivid cyan used for the main timeline spine and secondary highlights.

text-primary.name: primary-text
text-primary.description: White for main titles and body content.

text-secondary.name: secondary-text
text-secondary.description: Light grey for subtitles and less emphasized text.

text-goal.name: goal-text-color
text-goal.description: A soft yellow or gold for the 'GOAL:' text to make it stand out.

bullet-point.name: list-item-marker-color
bullet-point.description: The same vibrant purple as the primary accent, used for list item markers.

typography.fontFamily: Sans-Serif, preferably a futuristic or geometric font like 'Orbitron', 'Exo 2', or 'Rajdhani'

layout.structure: A vertical, single-column timeline with content cards branching off to the left and phase markers to the right, connected by a central 'spine'.

main-frame.name: page-outer-frame
main-frame.description: The decorative, non-intrusive border at the very top and bottom of the entire view.

header.name: roadmap-header
header.description: The main header section at the top containing the title and subtitle.

timeline-spine.name: central-connector-line
timeline-spine.description: The main vertical line that forms the backbone of the roadmap.

content-card.name: phase-details-card
content-card.description: The main container holding the details for each roadmap phase.

card-header.name: card-title-container
card-header.description: A custom-shaped header element within the content card for the title.

list-item-bullet.name: custom-bullet-point
list-item-bullet.description: The custom square bullet points used in the feature lists.

highlighted-item.name: emphasized-list-item
highlighted-item.description: A list item that is specially highlighted with a border.

phase-marker.name: phase-label-card
phase-marker.description: The smaller containers on the right side of the timeline that indicate the phase number.

phase-marker-mascot.name: phase-label-character
phase-marker-mascot.description: The small character illustration attached to each phase marker.
